tosdr.tldr: Twitter begins deleting all tracking data it collects from you after 10 days. You can also opt-out of personalisation settings which track your website visits to tailor their service to you. To completely opt-out, enable the Do-Not-Track option in your browser settings.
tosdr.case: tracking data deleted after 10 days and opt-out
